title: Video: How women can develop and embrace confidence
author: WORK180
body:
In her presentation from the “Leaders Engaging Diversity” event held at Griffith University, DCC cofounder Gemma Lloyd talks about her personal journey as a young female navigating her career in a male-dominated industry. DCC has developed a number of free resources to help women build confidence and progress their careers, click here to find out more.

 
About DCC Jobs

DCC Jobs is a jobs board with a difference! We pre-screen employers on paid parental leave, pay equity, flexible working arrangements and much more. This information is not publicly listed elsewhere and is an essential tool in your job search when assessing employers.
